content: Hey! Get cheap loans NOW!!! Click this link for free cash!
It looks like you might be sending unsolicited spam messages. If you have a home service request, please let me know how I can assist you. Otherwise, I will have to mark this number accordingly.
No thanks, just sending offers to people.
Thank you for confirming. I will mark this number as spam and will not accept further messages.
reason: Customer confirmed sending unsolicited spam messages
